name: Zone4 (itch)
description:
Zone 4 is a top down shooter. It plays like a typical top down shooter. Shoot enemies to destroy them, and if you get hit you lose. But there's a catch. The game takes place on 4 screens at once. The screens act as a parallel worlds that you can jump between at any time, but be careful as some special enemies can ignore the boarders between the screens. See how long you can survive.

Controls:

WASD or arrow keys: Move

Left click: Shoot

Right click: Jump to another screen

Credits:

Programming:

Joseph Kester

Music:

SynthR - The Last Prophecy

www.synthr.net
